source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Sketching of LANDSCAPE Drawing
items.headline: Drawing & Art Course with sketches, Landscape Drawing
objectives_summary: Drawing of Landscape
Textures, Perspective, Composition

items.title: Draw and tile Islamic geometric patterns in a zellige design
items.headline: Learn to construct and outline five geometric patterns from around the Islamic world
objectives_summary: Construct five different Islamic geometric patterns
Tile the patterns to create a larger composition
Combine the patterns in a layout to create an eye-catching zellige design

items.title: DIY FLORISTRY  SIGNAGE BOARD / FLOWER WALL COURSE
items.headline: You will learn how to choose and prepare the flowers, use and design the frame, and design an amazing floral masterpiece
objectives_summary: How to create step by step flower signage board / flower wall!!
Floristry

items.title: Introduction to Family History Research
items.headline: An all round introduction to the basics of genealogy (Family History) Research. What stories might your ancestors tell?
objectives_summary: appreciate why you are researching your family tree
understand the starting point for your research
realise the importance of record keeping

items.title: Learn Simple & Effective Cel Shading in Photoshop with Sycra
items.headline: Learn a simple colouring method that's perfect for creating multiple design iterations for concept and character design.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you'll be equipped with the tools you need to take any clean lineart, and add colour to it.
Not only will you be able to create one colour scheme, but with this method, you'll be able to create multiple iterations and colour schemes in no time at all.

items.title: The Complete Guide to Knitting | Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Learn how to knit like a pro from a complete beginner on this knitting journey with fun projects along the way!
objectives_summary: Knitting Basics; casting on stitches, simple knit stitch, casting off
Understand needle size and wool type
Learn a plethora of different stitches; including increasing and decreasing stitches

items.title: Advanced Tattoo Masterclass / For Tattoo Artist only

visible_instructors.name: Lily
visible_instructors.title: Lily Lu
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Tattoo Legend, Grafic Designer, Filmmaker, Youtube

items.headline: BIGGER - FASTER - BETTER / Step up your tattooing
objectives_summary: Tips and Hacks from my experience
Big needles & blackwork
Body anatomy and the placement of big pieces

items.title: Symmetry & Shape Drawing with Procreate for iPad!
items.headline: Create amazing mirrored art or mandalas! Draw perfectly straight lines, smooth curves, & clean shapes in your artwork.
objectives_summary: Students will learn to use Procreate 4.2's shape, line, and symmetry tools to create symmetrical art and mandalas with any iPad.
Students will learn the basics of using Procreate's tools and gestures.
Students will learn how to create perfectly straight lines, shapes, and curves in their own drawings.

items.title: How to Paint a 3D Simple Sculptural Rose
items.headline: Use Cake Decorating Tips to Paint a Simple Sculpture Made Out of Literal Paint.
objectives_summary: Create a Simple Sculptural Rose using thick paint.

items.title: Learn How to Draw the Nose - Figure Drawing Anatomy Course
items.headline: Beginning Portrait Art Step by Step - The Easy Way I Human body
objectives_summary: Learn to Draw the Nose
Learn to Draw

items.title: How to make a plush doll and dress it with lingerie
items.headline: By Clara Raurich
objectives_summary: How to make a plush doll and dress it with lingerie
Know some of the techniques that I have developed during my more than 10 years making plush dolls

items.title: Watercolor realistic portrait painting step by step workshop
items.headline: Watch me creating realistic portrait of a smiling gir in watercolor. I show the process and provide you with comments.
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint realistic portraits;
Get to know techniques I use in watercolor to paint skin, hair, eyes;
Learn how to work with watercolor layers so that they stay transparent and clear;

items.title: Complete fundamentals of drawing+ how to draw eyes easy
items.headline: Complete fundamentals of drawing+how to draw /shade a realistic eye step by step easy
objectives_summary: How to draw an eye
How to draw and shade an eye
How to draw and sketch a realistic eye

items.title: Introduction to Mixed Media - Creating Mixed Media Postcards

visible_instructors.name: Nina
visible_instructors.title: Nina Vangerow
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist & Creator at The Forgotten Bookshop Girl

items.headline: Learn the basics of mixed media art and create a set of four mixed media postcard or inspirational cards in the process.
objectives_summary: In this class students are going to learn about the basic steps involved in a mixed media art project, by creating a set of four mixed media postcards.

items.title: 2018 - Magic Secret Revealed - 60+ Impromptu Magic Tricks
items.headline: Magic - Learn Magic Secret that impress your friend. Most guarded Magic secret of all time. Read a person mind. Magic
objectives_summary: Able to Perform Basic and Advanced Magic Tricks
Learn Sleight of Hand to do Coin and Card Trick
Impress any girl with this trick

items.title: Solve both 3x3 and 2x2  Rubik cube by ONE simple algorithm
items.headline: Solve 3x3 and 2x2 Rubik's cube without memorizing complex algorithms. Instructions are based on using real cube
objectives_summary: First time ever: Solve the 3x3 & 2x2 Rubik cube by remembering just one simple algorithm
Are you new to Rubik cube?
Are you looking for an easy way to solve the Rubik cube?
